argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | orvcval.1 | |- ( ph -> Fun X ) |
| 2 |  | orvcval.2 | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 3 |  | orvcval.3 | |- ( ph -> A e. W ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_orvcval2 | |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC R A ) = { z e. dom X | ( X ` z ) R A } ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( z e. ( X oRVC R A ) <-> z e. { z e. dom X | ( X ` z ) R A } ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_rabid | |- ( z e. { z e. dom X | ( X ` z ) R A } <-> ( z e. dom X /\ ( X ` z ) R A ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ph -> ( z e. ( X oRVC R A ) <-> ( z e. dom X /\ ( X ` z ) R A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_baibd | |- ( ( ph /\ z e. dom X ) -> ( z e. ( X oRVC R A ) <-> ( X ` z ) R A ) ) |
